MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH43, EH44 and EH45 postcode areas of Walkerburn, Innerleithen and Peebles. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have been working on site throughout the day and in order to complete a permanent repair, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We are now working to get all power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:45pm on Friday, 4th December 2020.
